about_the_game:
(The folder for the OST downloads to "/Steam/steamapps/common/Saurian")

XZICD
Saurian - Original Game Soundtrack Vol. I

1.Birth
2.Hell Creek
3.Functional Didactyly
4.Antorbital Fenestra Shake
5.Ontogenetic Morphing
6.Ficus Planicostata
7.Maastrichtian Blues
8.Cypress Dome
9.Unfused Vertebrae
10.Ghost of the Floodplain Forest
11.Intraspecific Combat
12.Fibula Burst
13.Hadrosaurid Blues
14.Ichnofossil
15.Equisetum
16.Phylogenetic Bracketing
17.Parietal Sighting
18.Dakota Beachfront
19.Orbital Osteoderm
20.The Choice

Written by Francisco Godinho in association with Henry Meyers (with additional arrangements by Aaron Levine)
Produced, Mixed and Mastered by Francisco Godinho
Recorded by Francisco Godinho & Aaron Levine

Artwork: Chris Masna

©2017
